attributes.action: call by-elections in all constituentcies where the MP has been found claiming false expenses and agreed to pay them back.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If an MP agrees to return claimed funds then by association guilt has been admitted therefore the MP is not fit to stand and should immediately resign resulting in a by-election.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
